title: A definitive film of action and adventure.
review: From the heavily booby - trapped South American temple to the violent gun fight in Marion"s bar , from the confusing chase through the streets of Cairo to the painful fist fight with the Nazi strongman , from the exciting horse / car / truck / motorcycle chase to get control of the Ark to the Mexican stand - off with a rocket launcher to the final confrontation between good and evil , Raiders seems to have it all .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: This silent masterpiece , based off historical records , reveals the trial and execution of Joan of Arc .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: It was wonderfully acted , with Maria Falconetti giving a particularly moving performance as the lead .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: And director Carl Theodor Dreyer really captures the detailed expressions and emotions of all the actors through a constant use of close - ups , which also added to the sense of distress and torment , and hope and faith , this picture intended to convey .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: The film is also quite stylish , with sharp editing , reverse camera angles , quick montages , and multiple instances of symbolism .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: Set design , or at least what was shown of it , was sparse but believably so ,

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: and gave several nods to German expressionism .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: The Criterion DVD does justice to this once lost work of art , giving us the option to watch it completely silent or with the Voices of Light soundtrack , an operatic orchestration inspired by the film , which I found to be very fitting .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: Also included on the disc is a comprehensive commentary track , a feature on the history and many versions of the film , and several other worthwhile extras .

movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
title: ...and hope and faith...
review: All in all , this is the best silent film I"ve seen and I"m glad I went ahead and purchased it .
